title: Soccer Republic
text:
Soccer Republic is <a href="Raidi%C3%B3%20Teilif%C3%ADs%20%C3%89ireann">RTÉ</a>'s main <a href="Association%20football">football</a> television programme. It is shown on <a href="RT%C3%89%20Two">RTÉ Two</a> on Monday nights during the Irish football season, <a href="Broadcasting%20of%20sports%20events">showing highlights</a> of recent matches in Irish football's top division, the <a href="League%20of%20Ireland%20Premier%20Division">League of Ireland Premier Division</a> and also features on the <a href="Republic%20of%20Ireland%20national%20football%20team">Republic of Ireland</a> team.
The show is a re-branded version of the previous highlights programme <a href="Monday%20Night%20Soccer">Monday Night Soccer</a> which aired from 2008 until 2013.
Soccer Republic is presented by RTÉ presenter <a href="Peter%20Collins%20%28broadcaster%29">Peter Collins</a>.
The first edition of "Soccer Republic" was screened on RTÉ Two at 11.05pm on 10 March 2014.
Show.
The show is broadcast weekly on Monday evenings live from RTÉ Studio 6. Highlights of every <a href="League%20of%20Ireland%20Premier%20Division">League of Ireland Premier Division</a> game are shown, with interviews with the managers and players, followed by studio analysis. It is normally broadcast on Mondays at 11:05 PM to 12:05 AM. However, while the <a href="2014%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2014 FIFA World Cup</a> coverage was on RTÉ Two, Soccer Republic was only half an hour long from 7:30 PM to 8:00 PM on Monday.
